title: Beyond the seas
description: What happens after you graduate? You look for unversities to do your PHD. But going through all the websites to find the right university is tiresome. Beyond the seas is a platform where you can find all the information about the universities in one place.

title: Learn-E
description: built an web learning platform where students can sign up for courses and go through video content and take tests. The platform was built using Nodejs, React and PostgreSQL.

title: Web Scrapper
description: Built a web scrapper to scrap data from a website. The scrapper was built using python and selenium. The scrapper was able to scrap data from the different PHD portals to provide data to my project beyond the seas.

title: Car Warehouse
description: Built a car warehouse system using JavaFX. The system was able to store car information and show the information in a table. The system was built using JavaFX and MySQL.

title: C Compiler
description: Built a compiler from scratch with modern optimizations for a subset of C language.It was the hardest offline I had done in my university life and the most enjoyable as well.
